name: Edmund And Eliza (Work In Progress)
description:
Work In Progress build of Edmund And Eliza meant for showcase purposes. The final game is still in development but is set to release in May 2023. 

Edmund And Eliza is a story focused game where a knight ventures into a mysterious village in search for a merchant’s missing daughter. The player plays as two protagonists, the knight and the daughter. The knight’s gameplay section is focused on combat and exploration, while the daughter’s gameplay section is focused on stealth and puzzle solving.

This build showcases the first area of the game, the forest that leads directly to the village, where the majority of the game takes place. There are no main menus or any way to quit the game, you just have to manually close the game with alt-tab or the windows key. Normally there are not any enemies in this area, but I placed some around the map so that players can get a feel for the enemy combat and AI.

CONTROLS:
Walk: WS
Turn In Place: AD
Run: Shift (Toggle)
Attack: LMB (Light), RMB (Heavy)
Quick Turn: Q
Search Mode: Ctrl (Hold)
Dodge: Space
Inventory: Tab (Note, this feature is still in active development and does not work properly at this time)
Equip/Unequip Weapon: E
Interact: F
